org.fudgemsg
Class FudgeSize

java.lang.Object
  org.fudgemsg.FudgeSize

public class FudgeSize
extends java.lang.Object

Collects all of the size calculations for fudge stream elements together to simplify size calculations without constructing a full FudgeMsg object.

calculateFieldSize

public static <T> int calculateFieldSize(FudgeTaxonomy taxonomy,
                                         java.lang.Short ordinal,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         FudgeFieldType<T> type,
                                         T value)
Returns the size of a field (field header and value payload) in the Fudge stream in bytes.

Type Parameters:
T - underlying Java type of the field data
Parameters:
taxonomy - the encoding taxonomy, or null for none
ordinal - the ordinal, or null if none
name - the name, or null if none
type - the field type
value - the field value
Returns:
number of bytes

calculateFieldSize

public static <T> int calculateFieldSize(java.lang.Short ordinal,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         FudgeFieldType<T> type,
                                         T value)
Calculates the size of a field (field header and value payload) in the Fudge stream in bytes when no taxonomy is used.

Type Parameters:
T - underlying Java type of the field data
Parameters:
ordinal - ordinal index of the field (or null for none)
name - field name {or null for none)
type - FudgeFieldType of the field
value - field value (so size can be calculated for non-fixed width or reducible types)
Returns:
number of bytes
